walkthroughs.title: Get Started with VSCodroid
walkthroughs.description: Set up your mobile development environment

steps.title: Choose your theme
steps.description:
Pick a color theme that suits your style.

[Browse Color Themes](command:workbench.action.selectTheme)

steps.title: Your development tools
steps.description:
VSCodroid comes with everything you need to start coding:

$(check) **Node.js 20** + npm 10 — ready

$(check) **Python 3.12** + pip — ready

$(check) **Git 2.53** — ready

$(check) **make** — ready

More toolchains (Go, Rust, Java, C/C++, Ruby) coming soon.

[Got It](command:vscodroid.welcome.toolsDismissed)

steps.title: A powerful terminal
steps.description:
Open a full bash terminal with all your tools on PATH.

Run ``node``, ``python3``, ``git``, ``npm`` — they all just work.

[Open Terminal](command:workbench.action.terminal.new)

steps.title: Extend with more features
steps.description:
Install extensions from the Open VSX marketplace for language support, themes, and tools.

[Browse Extensions](command:workbench.view.extensions)
